DOC.brief_summary: Both warfarin dabigatran use stroke prophylaxis time catheter ablation atrial fibrillation . Although risk thromboembolism bleed warfarin well establish , relative risk benefit dabigatran set unknown . The purpose study assess efficacy warfarin versus dabigatran prevention stroke systemic embolic complication catheter ablation AF , compare prevalence serious bleed complication two OAC agent .
DOC.brief_title: Dabigatran Versus Warfarin Anticoagulation Before After Catheter Ablation Treatment Atrial Fibrillation
DOC.detailed_description: - Data patient collect 4 US 1 Canadian medical center - Retrospective record review patient undergone catheter ablation atrial fibrillation time period begin initiation dabigatran therapy stroke prophylaxis center end November 2011 . - Dabigatran study group comprise patient receive dabigatran stroke prophylaxis study time period . - Warfarin comparison group select patient receive warfarin stroke prophylaxis identical study time period . - Warfarin patient number sequentially - A subgroup warfarin patient identical number dabigatran patient center select use random number generator . Patient data set de-identified compile - Master data set store Excel file - Statistics perform SAS ( Cary , NC ) - Continuous data express mean Â± S.D. , compare unpaired t-tests - Categorical data compare Fisher 's exact test Chi-square - Complications include thromboembolic event bleed event record prevalence compare .
DOC.criteria: All patient undergoing catheter ablation atrial fibrillation none ( retrospective trial )
